name: Money Mist Leave In Conditioner
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:.A leave-in mist formulated with adaptive technology that transforms all hair types, delivering glossy, expensive-looking results with heat protection....Hair Texture:...Hair Type:...Hair Concerns:.....Key Benefits:.....Highlighted Ingredients:.....Ingredient Callouts:...What Else You Need to Know:...Clinical Results:..
ingredients: -Baolized Amino Complex: Adaptive technology treats the surface and inner layers of hair..-Amaranthus Extract: Penetrates to help reinforce, strengthen, and fortify hair strands..-Baobab Extract: Helps improve elasticity and bounce to damaged hair...Water, Butylene Glycol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Polyquaternium-55, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Propanediol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Stearyl Alcohol, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein Pg-Propyl Silanetriol, Crambe Maritima (Blue Sea Kale) Leaf Extract, Chlorella Pyrenoidosa Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Fragrance/Parfum, Ceteareth-20, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Potassium Benzoate, Dimethicone, Potassium Sorbate, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium Edta, Isopropyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray throughout clean, damp hair. .-Comb to distribute evenly. .-Style as usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with this product. If you have thick hair with natural wave, this is the leave in for you! I swear by it, truly the holy grail product. Smells amazing and you don’t need to spray a lot to notice a huge difference in your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, this product works wonders. You can really have this Hollywood look. Shiny, smooth and amazing waves and volume.  For sure not an every time kind of product, can be overwhelming to the hair sometimes, increasing your oiliness (one star less for that). Always use it with damp hair, not wet or dry. For the maximum benefit, have a deep clean hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on my 4th or 5th bottle. It's a must-have at this point! This feels completely weightless, it's easy to use, and makes wet hair super easy to comb through. My hair feels like there's zero product in it, but it's shinier and less frizzy. I love the heat protection element. I also like that it's practically fragrance-free (others have mentioned a scent, but I can't smell anything, which I prefer).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Surprisingly really good. I've used many different oils and leave-ins from Sephora that did little to nothing and STUNK like an old grandmother so I didn't have high expectations but this is really good stuff. I love that the scent is clean, slightly fruity and light. It's very moisturizing and I have coarse, frizzy Asian hair along with hard water in my apartment. The sprayer is a nice fine mist but I'll probably end up spraying it into my hands and dispersing it into my hair instead. Price is really good too compared to other products like this.

reviews.review_text: This is my second bottle. I got my first one from the company’s website but the bottle I recently got from Sephora doesn’t perform like the other one did. Is there a reformulation? The once tangle free, soft and shiny hair I get as an outcome is no longer achieved with this second bottle. I do the same routine, same frequency and same amount. I’m willing to give this product another go and get another bottle but if nothing performs the way it used to then I’m gonna have to find me a different brand (hopefully there is something just as good as my first experience with this because that was heaven sent)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Color Wow Money Mist (gifted by colorwowhair) is a well-loved hair product for several reasons: Brilliant Shine: This mist gives your hair a glossy, healthy-looking shine that stands out. It's perfect for adding that extra sparkle to your hairstyle. Lightweight Formula: Unlike some hair products that can weigh your hair down, the Money Mist is very light. It won’t make your hair feel heavy or greasy, so you can enjoy the shine without any buildup. Frizz Control: One of its standout features is its ability to control frizz. It smooths out flyaways and keeps your hair looking sleek and polished. Easy Application: The spray is easy to use. Just a few spritzes are enough to give your hair a beautiful finish, making it a convenient addition to your hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long, fine, colour treated hair, and a lot of it! Normally I’m fighting my hair with the brush after a wash, with this product I do a few sprays, let it settle on my hair for a min or two and the brush glides right through! Game changer!!

reviews.review_title: I love it - pls do not discontinue!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love this product. It smells incredibly fresh, kind of like a beach and laundry mixed together. It deranges my hair very well and gives provides very light moisture and a healthy non-weighed down shiny finish. I have very oily hair and I have thick porous and wirey strands but not a lot of hair… and I can’t use very heavy moisturizing products because my hair not only gets oily even faster but also clumps and flattens so I often struggle finding light-moisture products. This product keeps my hair clean, smooth, and not oily. If you are looking for deep moisture and extreme smoothing, this is not it so I suggest combining it with other hair products because this is very light. The continuous spray bottle is a little hard to get used to but I just lightly press the spray trigger and I can better control the amount, it’s kind of hard to go overboard with this product. Ps - I paid for this product and it’s NOT incentivized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff!  It smells nice and fresh and conditions my hair so well.  Use caution getting it on your roots/scalp, as it will make it feel like there is a lot of product build-up on your head.  I concentrate the spray ear level and down to my ends.  My blow dry is smoother and the flyaways are GONE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like there were some save your money reviews for this product but I decided to give it a try anyway. I primarily use this as an in-between washes spray to keep my hair hydrated, in particular because I have extensions, I find it's a good spray to put on before I brush to help blend my natural hair and extensions. I've also used it post-shower (although not as the *only* product I use) and it seems to leave my hair soft and shiny. The spray function on this is really unique - each spray lasts for a full second so you can move it is as you spray to get more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this spray. First off the name and packaging are so cute. The mist is super fine and layers over my hair without leaving it feeling heavy and greasy. I have long thick hair and it detangles it so easily. Gifted by colorwowhair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from colorwow. This is such a great leave-in conditioner that screams luxuriousness from the amazing formula to the unique packaging. It's very lightweight and dispenses as a fine mist, evenly coating my hair without leaving it feeling greasy or weighed down like a lot of other leave-in conditioners I've tried, and it smells absolutely fantastic. It leaves my hair feeling silky-smooth and helps it to retain moisture while also taming some of my frizz and reducing breaking. It also leaves my hair more manageable, shiny, and volumized while helping to promote healthy hair growth. It works super well as a heat/uv protectant and comes in a really cool bottle that features a lock button on the cap, which I love because I have young kids. Overall, I'm obsessed with this money mist and the benefits it delivers and will definitely purchase it again!

The lightweight formula doesn't weigh my hair down, yet it effectively tames frizz and flyaways, leaving me with smooth, luscious locks. Plus, the delightful scent is an added bonus! If you're looking for a leave-in conditioner that delivers noticeable results without any greasy residue this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone constantly in pursuit of the perfect hair, I’ve finally found my holy grail with the NEW Money Mist Luxe leave-in conditioner. From the first spritz, it’s evident this product means serious business.  This lightweight formula effortlessly detangles my hair, leaving it smooth and manageable without any heaviness. Not to mention, the glossy finish it imparts makes my hair look like it belongs on a magazine cover.  But it’s not just about aesthetics; this conditioner goes beyond the surface level. After just one use, I noticed a significant reduction in breakage and frizz, something I’ve struggled with for ages. The clinical results don’t lie – my hair feels stronger, healthier, and more resilient than ever before.

I do however mainly notice these results when I use heat on my hair (I believe this is a heat activated product) and I have no complaints! It doesn’t get rid of my frizz but I did enjoy this A LOT!! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the first application of Color Wow's Leave-In Conditioner, I knew my hair had met its match. The transformation was immediate and nothing short of miraculous. My hair feels silkier and more manageable than ever before—a noticeable difference that made combing through my usually tangled locks a breeze. The product itself has a lightweight feel that’s a dream to apply. It doesn't weigh down my hair or leave any greasy residue; instead, it vanishes into my strands, providing hydration without the heaviness. It’s like my hair drinks it in, leaving it feeling nourished and refreshed. Visually, my hair has never looked better. The frizz that once defined my hair's texture has been tamed, leaving behind sleek, glossy locks that reflect light beautifully. The natural wave in my hair is more defined, and overall, my hair looks healthier and more vibrant. * gifted by color wow *

reviews.review_text: I am someone who has a consistent hair routine and I don’t usual deviate from it all , especially since I have relaxed hair. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has truly exceeded my expectations in every aspect. From the moment I first applied it to my hair, I was impressed by its luxurious texture, which effortlessly glides through my strands without weighing them down. The scent is simply divine, leaving my hair delicately fragranced with a lingering aroma of quality and sophistication. Not only does it leave my hair feeling incredibly soft and manageable, but it also adds a beautiful shine that lasts throughout the day. I appreciate the thoughtful selection of ingredients, including nourishing oils and extracts, which provide both immediate hydration and long-term benefits to my hair's health. The packaging is not only sleek and stylish but also practical, making it easy to dispense just the right amount of product with each use. Despite its premium quality, the product offers excellent value for its performance, making it a staple in my hair care routine. Overall, I can confidently say that this product has become a cherished favorite, delivering exceptional results that never fail to impress. I got this product for free offered by colorqow
